title: Can't buy RP
body:
Hey,

So I'm trying to buy RP but everytime after I logged in to my Bank Account I get a white screen, normally I'd have to confrim via my bank account that I want to buy something but now I just get a plain white screen and I can't go any further. 
does anyone else have that problem? 
I've already tried reloading the client and even rebooting my pc.

replies.body:
We're aware of some issues with the iDEAL payment method at the moment. If this is the payment method you're using, I recommend using a different one for now, as there's currently no workaround.

We're still investigating, however at the moment it appears it's outside of our bounds and we're waiting for a third-party response. Please contact ING Bank support if you'd like more information on this.

I'm sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused, but please let me know if you have any further questions.

thanks for explaining what's happening so far.
unfortunately I have no other way of buying RP without IDEAL so I think I'll wait untill this problem has been fixed.

anyway, thanks Targons Blade.
same problem here also with ING bank, ill just be patiently waiting then{{champion:26}}

it's been fixed today, if you haven't played/noticed. 
you can buy via IDEAL/ING again.
